overview: Biocentrism, a new utopia? How can we change our relationship with living things? How to move mentalities? So I went to film the bowels of the Brive SPA. I've seen rescued cats and dogs there, but not only that, but humans also come, live, work, and build there. Often volunteers, sometimes employees, have built a place of refuge for mutual aid. While outside the drama continues.
title: Animal Aimé
